程序包 map_reduce_sys

类 DistributedCVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
        • map_reduce_sys.DistributedCVM
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
    public class DistributedCVM
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
    The class CVM implements the deployment of a gestion component and three calculate components in multi-Jvm.The 4 components are arranged in 4 different jvm's
    作者:
    Yajie LIU, Zimeng ZHANG

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      static java.lang.String GESTION_JVM_URI
      uri of jvm where we deploy the getsion component
      static java.lang.String MAP_JVM_URI
      uri of jvm where we deploy the map component
      static java.lang.String REDUCE_JVM_URI
      uri of jvm where we deploy the reduce component
      static java.lang.String RESOURCE_JVM_URI
      uri of jvm where we deploy the resource component
      static java.lang.String URI_PORT_REFLEXION1
      uri of the reflection inbound port of the calculate component 1
      static java.lang.String URI_PORT_REFLEXION2
      uri of the reflection inbound port of the calculate component 2
      static java.lang.String URI_PORT_REFLEXION3
      uri of the reflection inbound port of the calculate component 3
